author: rstcxk
long_description:
this is a mod that filters the chat using the filter++ liberary which is 100X-10000X faster
than other filtering mods, while having better filtering detection

see it's [page](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rstcxk/filterpp_lib) for more details

players with the `filter++_reviewer` privilege will get notified of violations as they happen,
and get reports that show the violating word

optionally filter++ intergrates with the `warn` mod, players that swear will get warned
name: filterpp
short_description: censors swears in the player chat using the filter++ liberary
title: filter++
